Detailed Description

Defines a simple data cache.

The data cache is virtually addressed and physically tagged. Its size and associativity can be set (parameters to the constructor). The cache has a LRU replacement policy. It has a cache locking capability to freeze its contents with its current contents

Member Function Documentation

int DCache::LoadLine (  int  physaddress  ) 
 

Load a cache line with instructions from given address has no effect if locked != CACHE_UNLOCKED and all corresponding cache lines are valid, or if the address is already in cache. Return CACHE_HIT if there was a cache hit, CACHE_MISS if there was a miss.

void DCache::Lock (  int  flag  ) 
 

Lock the cache if flag != CACHE_UNLOCKED, unlock otherwise

void DCache::Print (  void   ) 
 

Display the cache contents
